main event: A USAF pilot and ground crew simultaneously sighted a cigar-shaped, elongated cylinder with a reddish glow around the circumference in Heyford, England in an erratic flight path, changing direction and altitude abruptly.
interesting points: The UFO was sighted at an altitude of 5,000 to 10,000 feet and estimated to be traveling at a speed of 400 to 600 mph.
The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes, providing a substantial observation period.
The object's maneuver involved erratic flight patterns and abrupt changes in direction and altitude.
The report mentions that the observation took place in clear skies with good visibility.
The sighting was witnessed by both a USAF pilot and ground crew simultaneously, adding credibility to the report.
sighted object: cigar-shaped, elongated cylinder with a reddish glow around the circumference
